results.description: Eintracht Frankfurt captain David Abraham shoulder barges Freiburg manager Christian Streich, sparking a brawl in which two red cards were shown.
results.shortTitle: Watch: Frankfurt captain sent off after barging opposition manager
results.title: Bundesliga: Eintracht Frankfurt captain sent off after barging opposition manager

results.description: Eintracht Frankfurt captain David Abraham is sent off for barging over SC Freiburg coach Christian Streich in a fiery Bundesliga clash.
results.shortTitle: Freiburg coach Streich barged over in fiery clash
results.title: SC Freiburg 1-0 Eintracht Frankfurt: Abraham sent off for pushing Streich

results.description: Eintracht Frankfurt fans are banned from entering the Belgium city of Liege for Thursday's Europa League group game against Standard Liege.
results.shortTitle: Liege bans Eintracht Frankfurt fans
results.title: Eintracht Frankfurt fans banned from city of Liege for Europa League tie

results.description: Watch highlights as Eintracht Frankfurt thrash 10-man Bayern Munich 5-1 - a result which saw boss Niko Kovac sacked.
results.shortTitle: Watch: Frankfurt demolish 10-man Bayern Munich 5-1
results.title: Bundesliga: Eintracht Frankfurt demolish 10-man Bayern Munich 5-1

results.description: Bayern Munich suffer a crushing defeat against Eintracht Frankfurt after the German champions had Jerome Boateng sent-off after nine minutes.
results.shortTitle: Frankfurt thrash 10-man Bayern Munich
results.title: Eintracht Frankfurt 5-1 Bayern Munich: Bundesliga champions thrashed after Jerome Boateng's early dismissal

results.description: Borussia Monchengladbach return to the top of Bundesliga with a 4-2 win over Eintracht Frankfurt.
results.shortTitle: Monchengladbach beat Eintracht to go top
results.title: Borussia Monchengladbach 4-2 Eintracht Frankfurt: Gladbach go back to top of table

thumbnail.altText: Denis Zakaria celebrates with his teammates after scoring Borussia Moenchengladbach's fourth goal against Eintracht Frankfurt.

results.description: Arsenal's academy graduates impress to help the Gunners begin their Europa League campaign with a victory at Eintracht Frankfurt
results.shortTitle: Arsenal beat Eintracht in opener
results.title: Eintracht Frankfurt 0-3 Arsenal: Gunners begin Europa League with win in Germany

thumbnail.altText: Granit Xhaka, Joe Willock, Pierre Emerick Aubameyang

results.description: Newcastle sign French winger Allan Saint-Maximin from Nice for a reported £16.5m on a six-year deal.
results.shortTitle: Newcastle sign £16.5m Saint-Maximin
results.title: Allan Saint-Maximin: Newcastle sign French winger from Nice for £16.5m

results.description: West Ham sign French striker Sebastien Haller from Eintracht Frankfurt in a club record deal worth up to £45m.
results.shortTitle: West Ham sign Haller in record £45m deal
results.title: Sebastien Haller: West Ham sign Eintracht Frankfurt striker for club record £45m

results.description: Eintracht Frankfurt striker Sebastien Haller is travelling to West Ham for a medical before a club record transfer worth up to £45m.
results.shortTitle: West Ham close on £45m striker Haller
results.title: Sebastien Haller: West Ham set to sign Eintracht Frankfurt striker for up to £45m

results.description: Germany's most successful women's football club FFC Frankfurt is set to be taken over by Bundesliga side Eintracht Frankfurt.
results.shortTitle: Eintracht set to take over women's team
results.title: Eintracht Frankfurt set to take over iconic women's team FFC Frankfurt

results.description: Real Madrid sign striker Luka Jovic from Eintracht Frankfurt for an undisclosed fee, subject to a medical.
results.shortTitle: Real to sign Frankfurt striker Jovic
results.title: Luka Jovic: Real Madrid to sign Eintracht Frankfurt striker

results.description: Arjen Robben and Franck Ribery sign off their Bayern Munich careers with a goal each during a 5-1 win over Frankfurt, to clinch a seventh consecutive Bundesliga title.
results.shortTitle: Robben & Ribery score in final game as Bayern win seventh straight title
results.title: Bayern Munich: Arjen Robben & Franck Ribery score as Bayern win seventh straight title

results.description: Bayern Munich, who trailed Borussia Dortmund by nine points after 12 games, clinch a seventh successive Bundesliga title.
results.shortTitle: Bayern win seals seventh straight title
results.title: Bayern Munich 5-1 Eintracht Frankfurt

thumbnail.altText: (from the left), Bayern Munich's Arjen Robben, Rafinha and Franck Ribery

results.description: Bayern Munich host Eintracht Frankfurt and Borussia Dortmund travel to Borussia Monchengladbach - follow live text coverage of the final day of the German Bundesliga.
results.shortTitle: Bayern win to secure seventh straight Bundesliga title
results.title: Bundesliga - final day live: Bayern Munich v Eintracht Frankfurt & Borussia Monchengladbach v Borussia Dortmund

results.description: Chelsea manager Maurizio Sarri says his side "deserve to win a trophy" this season after reaching the Europa League final, beating Eintracht Frankfurt on penalties.
results.shortTitle: Chelsea deserve to win a trophy – Sarri
results.title: Chelsea 1-1 Eintracht Frankfurt: Chelsea deserve to win a trophy – Maurizio Sarri

results.description: Eden Hazard scores the winning penalty as Chelsea edge past Eintracht Frankfurt 4-3 on penalties to set up an all-English Europa League final against Arsenal.
results.shortTitle: Chelsea win on penalties to reach final
results.title: Chelsea 1-1 Eintracht Frankfurt: Blues win 4-3 on penalties to set-up Arsenal final

results.description: Chelsea will face Arsenal in the Europa League final after overcoming Eintracht Frankfurt on penalties.
results.shortTitle: Chelsea win on penalties to set up Europa League final with Arsenal - reaction
results.title: Europa League semi-finals - Arsenal & Chelsea in action

results.description: Bayer Leverkusen hit six goals in the first 36 minutes to boost their Champions League hopes by thrashing Bundesliga top-four rivals Eintracht Frankfurt.
results.shortTitle: Leverkusen score six in first 36 minutes
results.title: Bayer Leverkusen 6-1 Eintracht Frankfurt: Hosts thrash top-four rivals

thumbnail.altText: Lukas Hradecky (L) and Leverkusen's German midfielder Julian Brandt

results.description: Pedro scores an away goal as Chelsea recover from an early setback to draw with Eintracht Frankfurt in the first leg of their Europa League semi-final.
results.shortTitle: Pedro goal gives Chelsea first-leg draw
results.title: Eintracht Frankfurt 1-1 Chelsea: Pedro grabs away goal in Europa League semi-final
